Text: The ICC’s historic arrest warrants against leaders of a ‘Western democracy’ - in the words of western media - is a TWAIL moment: impunity of the West for its grave crimes is ending.

The historic arrest warrants issued by the ICC against Netanyahu, Gallant and a Hamas commander  are a major step towards accountability for atrocities. This has reputational and legacy costs, not just the possibility of actual arrest.

The war in Gaza is a war against memory. Like all totalitarian projects, the occupation in Palestine reminds us that the struggle of man against power is indeed the struggle of memory against forgetting, to quote Milan Kundera.

The historic arrest warrants issued by the ICC against Netanyahu, Gallant and a Hamas commander  are a major step towards accountability for atrocities. This has reputational and legacy costs, not just the possibility of actual arrest.
The ICC’s historic arrest warrants against leaders of a ‘Western democracy’ - in the words of western media - is a TWAIL moment: impunity of the West for its grave crimes is ending.

Senator Sanders rightly calls for arms sales to Israel to stop in compliance with US and international law, as we, UN experts have been reiterating for months. Hope the motion in the US Senate gains traction.
The Global South stands with Palestine.
40,000 homes destroyed in South Lebanon by Israel. This is domicide pure and simple. We must count down to the day when there must be a reckoning for this atrocity.

An exhibit on domicide has opened at the Smithsonian Design Museum in New York for one year. It’s moving, powerful and a testimony to vast, unspeakable crimes. I was glad to play a part in supporting it. The accompanying book has an interview with me.

Israel minister in charge of administering the West Bank openly says that it is to time to formally annex it, now that Trump has been elected as the next US President. Will the US entirely abandon international law and enable this too?
Interview on the global housing crisis including discrimination, forced evictions, climate change, Gaza and domicide with Egypt’s Akhbar El Youm newspaper at the World Urban Summit in Cairo,
Interview on domicide in Gaza and Lebanon in the National.
TRT’s excellent documentary in English about South Africa’s genocide case against Israel at the ICJ. I was glad to be interviewed for this.

Another interview on Al Qahera news on the destruction of Gaza and Southern Lebanon. المقرر الأممي  للحق بالسكن: الهجوم الإسرائيلي على المنظمات الأممية انتها... https://youtu.be/BmiotzDd6-A?si=yatDPKnJEJ60q_0g… via 
@YouTube

Italy announces arms embargo on Israel. Although a bit too late but it is the right response. The ICJ ruling on Israel’s occupation and the provisional measures order on genocide, all require this embargo by all States against Israel.

These images are seared into our collective consciousness as a symbol of bestiality, brutality and eternal shame. Hundreds of Palestinian men stripped naked in the middle of rubble in Jabalya. When and how will this end? Where is humanity?

An emotionally difficult interview on Palestinian TV on the utter destruction of Gaza. Palestinian people’s dignity and courage in the face of so much injustice and suffering are incomparable. https://we.tl/t-jydA47fqHo

A tragedy within a tragedy: UN experts sound alarm on harrowing conditions faced by Palestinians with disabilities trapped in #Gaza, who endure extreme trauma & psychological harm, with routine indiscriminate attacks leaving many injured or killed.

https://ohchr.org/en/press-releases/2024/10/tragedy-within-tragedy-un-experts-alarmed-harrowing-conditions-palestinians…

Interview on Al Jazeera Arabic about Gaza and.          Lebanon.   N.           المقرر الأممي: تدمير المنازل في غزة وجنوب لبنان استراتيجية لتوسيع الاستيطان https://youtu.be/wDhpH0vT8ug?si=WqwhhV_8lLop0K1l… via 
@YouTube

More evidence that Israel doesn’t just wage war - in Gaza and now in Lebanon - but a scorched earth campaign that levels all houses, mosques, schools and signs of habitation. The objective is not military, but extermination and annexation.
Gaza: the Rights to Food, Water & Housing- Press Conference by the Special Rapporteurs | UN Web TV

US warning to Israel to stop arms transfers comes far far too late and while it’s still good news if true, it should last until at least the occupation ends. That’s legally the consequence of the ICJ ruling on the illegality of the occupation.

A defense system to support an offensive war to support an occupation/annexation. https://nytimes.com/2024/10/13/us/politics/us-missile-defense-iran-israel.html?unlocked_article_code=1.R04.UqSA.lTxn2GysFapd&smid=nytcore-ios-share&referringSource=articleShare… via 
@NYTimes

Excellent documentary on the historic ICJ case brought by South Africa against Israel. I was happy to be interviewed for this

وثائقيات TRT عربي | 
العدالة مطلوبة https://youtu.be/y51wj37k4Do?si=tVDRLF63pntl9VNj… via 
@YouTube

Costs of War project at Brown University estimates that more than 100,000 people have been killed by Israel in Gaza in one year - conservatively speaking. Is this not high enough for meaningful action to stop this mayhem?

The obligation to prevent genocide should mean that this evil plan should never get off the ground. Enough savagery has been witnessed in Gaza. Time for ceasefire, not another spasm of genocidal violence.
Just published: It is time to admit Palestine as a full member of the UN

Deja vu in Lebanon as Israel attacks. Both sides should stop attacks which largely affect civilians and respect UN SC resolutions including 1701. Israel appears to have been planning for this for a while - see below.
Yet another horrific Israeli attack on a school sheltering women and children in Gaza. This catalogue of crimes must be held to account one day.

In a historic vote, the UN General Assembly overwhelmingly calls for end of Israeli occupation within 12 months. Similar to its demand to end the presence of UK in Chagos Island within 6 months. This is international law’s TWAIL moment.

UN experts warn international order stands on a knife’s edge, call on States to comply with 
@CIJ_ICJ
  Advisory Opinion and act now to stop Israel’s attacks against #Palestinians and end its unlawful occupation of Palestinian territory.

https://ohchr.org/en/statements/2024/09/un-experts-warn-international-order-knifes-edge-urge-states-comply-icj-advisory…
Uniting for Peace resolution request by the Arab League, OIC and NAM on the situation in occupied Palestine. If it goes forward and action is taken, it will be very significant.

US Sec. of State Anthony Blinken: “Israeli security forces need to make some fundamental changes to the way they operate in the West Bank, including changes to their rules of engagement”. 

Yes and Israel should not be operating there in the first place.

I severely condemn yet another attack on people sheltering in Al-Mawasi in the so-called Khan Younis “safe zone”. There is zero attention to proportionality or distinction. Attacks on shelters are war crimes and crimes against humanity.
Home demolitions = annexation of land. The strategy seems to be to rid all Palestinians from their land.

Hugely disappointed at this Indian Supreme Court ruling which dismissed a Plea To Stop India's Military Exports To Israel Amidst genocide. The court has ignored India’s and its own legal obligations. A backward looking decision.

What the Israeli army is doing in Jenin and other locations in the West Bank is a continuation of the extermination campaign it has been waging in Gaza. What’s the justification and the end game here? When will the rest of the world and the Israeli public say, Enough!

Apartheid #Israel is targeting #Gaza & the #WestBank simultaneously- UN independent expert 
@FranceskAlbs
 warns of unprecedented violence & #HumanRights violations, urging global action to prevent genocide against Palestinians & ensure accountability.

https://ohchr.org/en/press-releases/2024/09/apartheid-israel-targeting-gaza-and-west-bank-simultaneously-says-expert…

Agreed. If occupation is unlawful ab initio, no legal right including the right to self determination can arise from it. A country can only defend its own territory, not a territory that it has illegally occupied.

Israel is Demolition Nation par excellence. Evidence of vast demolition of housing in Rafah, a pattern that extends far back, again shows commission of vast international crimes including domicide. ICC cannot fail to add these to its charges.

Interview on Al Jazeera on the continuing tragedy of Gaza

مسؤول أممي للجزيرة 
مباشر: ما يحدث في غزة لم نشهده خلال أي صراع https://youtu.be/1O-8dSEtTys?si=vNm33esbRFUWCxLd… via 
@YouTube

It is now clear that it is America itself which is leading genocidal war against the Palestinians. Israel is simply the instrument. All are equally guilty of grave breaches of international law and elementary decency but America is primarily at fault.

The horrors in #Gaza never stop. Schools are protected objects under international law and even if the usual claims are made about Hamas fighters hiding in schools, the killings are excessively brutal. This is an extermination campaign against the people of Gaza.
Interview and story by Anadolu English News Agency: Global South has key role to play in ending Israel’s war on Gaza, reforming world order

Amicus petition filed by us UN experts at the ICC re Palestine: 1. ICC has jurisdiction based on the Rome statute not due to delegation. 2. Palestine never lost prescriptive jurisdiction. 3. Jus cogens norms require urgent arrest warrants now.

https://icc-cpi.int/sites/default/files/CourtRecords/0902ebd1809264ea.pdf…
Even as Gaza is being obliterated, let’s not forget that homes are being demolished by Israel in East Jerusalem and the West Bank. The criminality continues.

UN experts hail 
@CIJ_ICJ
 declaration on illegality of Israel’s presence in the occupied #Palestinian territory as “historic” for Palestinians and international law.

They reiterate their call for international #arms embargo and #CeasefireNOW.

https://ohchr.org/en/press-releases/2024/07/experts-hail-icj-declaration-illegality-israels-presence-occupied…

I deplore this loss of lives. Thousands of Israelis have already been forced to flee their homes from northern Israel due to similar attacks. Ceasefire in Gaza is urgently required to stop this escalating violence between Israel and its neighbors.

#USA: Free speech on campus must be protected, not attacked - UN experts express grave concern at the massive crackdown on pro-#Palestinian student protests at #university campuses across the US.

https://ohchr.org/en/press-releases/2024/07/usa-free-speech-campus-needs-be-protected-not-attacked-say-experts…
A historic decision by the @ICJ that Israeli occupation of Palestinian territory is unlawful. More to follow after review.
Interview on al-Arabia TV to discuss the new UNEP report on the awful destruction of Gaza including housing.
A dystopian vision of Gaza’s future: make it like NEOM after a genocide. This vision is a crime against architecture itself, not just humanity.
We are now seeing famine across the whole of Gaza. All houses destroyed, food systems destroyed and healthcare destroyed. And kids are dying. Is there any humanity left?

If true, this shows the broad non partisan support in Israel for genocide which results from occupation, apartheid and land theft. Israeli establishment is too used to occupying others’ territories without any accountability.
Interview in Arabic on Al Qahera TV on housing destruction and path towards rebuilding in Gaza.

Norway Pension fund exits Caterpillar investment on Israel human rights abuse concerns. Caterpillar was called out by UN experts, including me. Caterpillar equipment extensively used in demolitions of Palestinian homes.

I welcome the ICC arrest warrants for Russian officials over alleged Ukraine warcrimes against civilian infrastructure like power plants. Now issue arrest warrants against Israeli officials for the same crimes!

This major arms sale by the US to Israel, during a genocide, is worth $18 billion. It will be paid by US tax payers themselves through their $3.3 billion annual aid package to Israel! This is perverse and makes every tax payer morally complicit in genocide

Major arms sale to Israel, for $18 billion, approved by the US. It’s a gross violation of international law and world public opinion including the April resolution of the UNHRC. Those complicit must be made to pay one day.

Interview on Al Jazeera Mubasher Arabic on Gaza 

خبراء أمميون: مذبحة 
النصيرات "جريمة حرب" https://youtu.be/9lsVB2F6Dfs?si=mtwULEUeBjc7VmGi… via 
@YouTube

UN Independent Commission of Inquiry on the OpT also finds that Israel - and Hamas - have committed war crimes and crimes against humanity. When will real accountability begin?

https://ohchr.org/sites/default/files/documents/hrbodies/hrcouncil/sessions-regular/session56/a-hrc-56-26-auv.docx…

Countries that celebrate the release of four Israeli hostages without saying a word about the hundreds of Palestinians killed and thousands held in arbitrary detention by Israel, have lost moral credibility for generations and don’t deserve to be on any UN human rights body.
Highly welcome this decision by the UN to put Israel on blacklist for harming children in conflict zones. Arms embargo against Israel by the US and all other countries and companies should follow.
What large sections of Israeli society have become.

I join my fellow UN experts on the Israeli strikes on civilians sheltering in Rafah; “Even if Israeli leaders claim now that the strikes were a 'mistake', they bear international legal responsibility. Calling it a mistake will not make the strikes legal…”
Israeli tanks hit evacuation zone of Al-Mawasi again, killing 21 people in tents. When will this macabre obscenity end?
Attacking women and children while they cower in their shelters in Rafah is a monstrous atrocity. We need concerted global action to stop Israel’s actions now.

Israel must immediately comply and US and others supplying weapons must halt their deliveries immediately.

https://wapo.st/3WTF9Th
Attacks on the ICC by the US, Israel and other Western countries promote a culture of impunity.

On the request by the ICC Prosecutor for warrants: against Hamas, the charges of hostage taking and killing likely to stand but not others. Against Israeli leaders, all charges likely to stick. And missing charges include attacks against various civilian objects including homes!
Finally: ICC Prosecutor acts and requests arrest warrants against Hamas and Israeli leaders.

The catastrophe in Gaza. An interview again on Al Jazeera English.

https://mediaview.aljazeera.com/video/7McvlcGu2Y/85801…
Gaza evacuations are expanding, while more mass graves are being located. The Israeli ground invasion of Rafah continues committing genocide and the world is doing too little, and too late.
And she points to the loss of housing and food access and threats of deportation of foreign students - all because they dare to speak truth to power about Gaza, apartheid and occupation.
Onto full Statehood for Palestine very soon! And use the same GA majority to withdraw credentials of Israel just as the GA did with South Africa.
Armed mob sets UNRWA HQ on fire. Israel is a member of the UN and cannot stand by or allow this to happen if it is still a functioning State.

Army and security folks - read about domicide in Gaza in http://armytechnology.com.
How much more evidence of serious war crimes, crimes against humanity and Genocide can one provide for the war to stop and for accountability?

Chants of ‘cancer Gypsies’ and ‘cancer Jews’ as a violent mob goes on the rampage against Travellers in the Netherlands. I saw how vulnerable Travellers are during my country visit to the Netherlands. This climate of intolerance and violence must end now.
Interview on challenges of rebuilding Gaza - CNN Newsroom with John Vause

#Gaza: UN experts appalled by #Israel’s ‘vicious & indiscriminate’ attacks on women, call for #CeasefireNOW & end to weapons export by States.

 "States cannot ignore that these weapons are being used to kill & maim women and children."

https://ohchr.org/en/press-releases/2024/05/onslaught-violence-against-women-and-children-gaza-unacceptable-un-experts…
Interview on Gaza at Turkey’s Yeni Şafak News

It will take 80 years to rebuild all the 79,000 destroyed homes in Gaza: UNDP. And that doesn’t include repairing damaged homes, which are close to another 300K. This has to to be the worst ever war damage to housing in modern history.
Sending more and more weapons to Israel is aiding and abetting and conspiring to commit war crimes and genocide. US officials, leaders, the companies that supply the weapons are all legally liable.
Leave the students who are protesting the barbarity in Gaza alone. Violently repressing legitimate movements makes revolutions out of them besides being wrong.
The catastrophe of domicide in Gaza: its 37m tonnes of bomb-filled debris could take 14 years to clear.
If true, this is an atrocious form of torture of the Palestinian population in Gaza including at Rafah. Tents can’t become traps. Better temporary housing is the need of the hour.
Important report by Josh Paul and Noura Erekat led group on US national security and Israel’s conduct in the Gaza war.
Israel’s claims about UNRWA are exposed. Reminds one of US claims about WMDs in Iraq. Funding to UNRWA must be restored now.

The escalation of tit for tat attacks by Israel and Iran, are frightening in a region seething with so much tension. They are both illegal. International law allows self defense against an armed attack but not armed reprisal, revenge or retaliation. De-escalate now!

US vetoes Palestinian request for full UN membership. This is legally wrong. Veto power is not unlimited and can’t be used repeatedly to deny the right to self determination. Time to unseat Israel from the UN.
Urbicide and domicide in Gaza in Le Monde.

"Systematic and widespread destruction of housing & civilian infrastructure represents a crime against humanity" : UN experts condemn #Israel’s purported use of Artificial Intelligence #AI in #Gaza '#domicide' and urge reparative rebuilding

https://ohchr.org/en/press-releases/2024/04/gaza-un-experts-deplore-use-purported-ai-commit-domicide-gaza-call…

I appeal to Iran and Israel to exercise maximum restraint and avoid escalation in the region which will resolve nothing. The world needs to stay focused on ending the war in Gaza and the occupation, release of hostages and urgent humanitarian aid.
The right thing to do which also happens to be Germany’s international legal obligation. Stop arms transfers to Israel.

Palestine’s effort to be admitted to the UN as a full member seems to have hit a roadblock again. Same result as in 2011 about which I wrote this:

https://huffpost.com/entry/the-palestine-un-vote-is-_b_964918…

Interview on Gaza on Al Jazeera 

مقرر أممي: ما تقوم به 
إسرائيل من تدمير هدفه تقويض الحياة نهائيًا في غزة https://youtu.be/AjXXkrQR-rE?si=suoEgcaE7EJcGtDs… via 
@YouTube
More evidence of genocide in Gaza by Israeli leaders. Will the ICC ever act? We are now at a stage when no action looks like complicity.
A documentation of domicide in Gaza. Did a human or artificial intelligence select this target? https://x.com/OmarSShakir/st/OmarSShakir/status/1775776988134871109…
Terminator movie in real life - Israel uses AI led bombing to kill thousands in Gaza in their sleep at homes. No wonder so many homes are arbitrarily destroyed.
Latest report from the World Bank, UN and EU about the damage and needs assessment in Gaza: estimated damage at $18.5 billion - about 97% of the total GDP of Gaza and West Bank in 2022.
This is a wake up call. Israel and countries like the US and Germany that broke up Gaza must now own it - we need a reparative approach to rebuilding Gaza.
Link to World Bank report: https://thedocs.worldbank.org/en/doc/14e309cd34e04e40b90eb19afa7b5d15-0280012024/original/Gaza-Interim-Damage-Assessment-032924-Final.pdf…

The ICJ’s new order of provisional measures against Israel in the new application brought by South Africa is too little and too late. Genocide has been ongoing and the provisional measures are very inadequate. http://icj-cij.org/sites/default/…
Excellent assessment of domicide in Gaza by Prof Priya Gupta.
At last - UN Security Council adopts resolution demanding cease fire in Gaza. Israel must comply now. And US and other states must immediately stop weapon sales and shipments to Israel.

So many thousands of people in Gaza are trapped under the rubble of their own homes, dead, or dying. And no heavy machinery or fuel is available due to Israeli blockade. These are not just war crimes, but acts of mass torture and brutality.
Domicide in Gaza on NY Times TikTok:
Powerful appeal by Irish Famine historians regarding famine in Gaza.
23 million tons of debris in Gaza will take ‘years to clear’. Let that sink in.

Will the US now support a UN security council resolution to impose a cease fire?

https://cnn.com/videos/politics/2024/03/03/kamala-harris-gaza-ceasefire-israel-hamas-sot-vpx.cnn?sp_amp_linker=1*1tlmuh*amp_id*dnlxM2llUjdFLTU5SjRyc2FsMU9PT1N2MDVlbmZha1VzYnc3aXpZM2FJVmZ0RmtmQ0ZrdGxERFBtdVdMTFlwbw…..
A blatant ongoing violation of this US policy and several US laws including the Leahy law, is occurring in transferring arms to Israel. Congress, and the people of the US - pay notice!
US should airdrop Marines to protect Palestinians in Gaza from ongoing genocide. It is legally mandated. Not some PR exercise of aid drop.
This attack on humanitarian convoy and killing children is inhumane and savage. Israel’s institutionalized impunity must be ended now.
If true, this shows contempt of court by Israel.
One more interview on Gaza in Arabic on Al Jazeera Mubasher

Arab group is "demanding that #Israel be punished for its crimes and violations of int'l law and int'l humanitarian law by freezing its membership in the General Assembly, and demanding a stop to supplying it with weapons and ammunition." What I have been saying for months.

The reported call to close down UNRWA by Israel must be completely rejected. We rejected it in our statement sometime back: https://ohchr.org/en/press-releases/2024/02/states-must-reinstate-and-strengthen-support-unrwa-amid-unfolding-genocide…
Interview on Al Qahera news in Arabic, on Gaza and the steps forward including by the UNGA.

Urgent call by humanitarian agencies and leaders - people in Gaza are in grave peril. https://who.int/news/item/21-02-2024-statement-by-principals-of-the-inter-agency-standing-committee-(iasc)-on-gaza…
Interview on Al Jazeera Arabic where I touch on what the UNGA can still do to save the day for Gaza. https://mediaview.aljazeera.com/video/zanKIVbN0H/82712…
Every veto by the US is a new act of aiding and abetting genocide and individuals involved are providing material support to international crimes.

Given this manifest inability or unwillingness of the UNSC, the UNGA must now act: it’s now or never. Strongly recommend that the UNGA: 1) Immediate ask for a cease fire declaration under the Uniting for peace resolution; 2) Unseat Israel through the credentials committee;

3) ask countries to impose an arms embargo and other material assistance to conflict on both sides; 3) establish a tribunal for accountability either under article 22 of the Charter or through an agreement between Palestine and the UN as in the ECCC Cambodia.

Palestine’s legal team was brilliant at the ICJ. “The right of self determination requires that UN member states bring Israel’s occupation to an immediate end. No aid, no assistance, no complicity, no contribution to forcible actions, no money, no arms, no trade, no nothing.”

Tomorrow the ICJ will open hearings in the case of Legal Consequences arising from Israeli Occupation. Occupation is always illegal, no matter how long it has existed. Land theft and home demolitions are the main tools of converting occupation to annexation. Hoping for justice!
Interview on Gaza by the Turkish Anadolu News Agency. The intolerable suffering in Gaza knows no end.

Important: South Africa approaches the ICJ again - about the situation in Rafah.

https://thepresidency.gov.za/south-africa-makes-urgent-request-international-court-justice-rafah-offensive…
Rafah is the latest ‘killing fields’ of Israel. Far worse than Srebrenica - where too many thousands of refugees had crowded into Potočari - which was adjudged to be genocide.
Young Israelis block aid to Gaza while IDF soldiers stand and watch. Shameful and criminal!

BBC interview on Gaza, starts at 27:20.

https://bbc.co.uk/sounds/play/w172z37q12hlmb3…
NPR on domicide in Gaza. Is anyone listening? People are at grave risk in Rafah.

Yet another documentation of savage domicide by Israel. Will Israel report this destruction to the ICJ in its first report which is coming due? How will the ICJ interpret this? I see this as evidence of genocide and a blatant violation of ICJ’s ruling.
Everyday after the #ICJ ruling, Israel and its allies have been in breach of that ruling. What is the consequence?
By the same logic, why can’t Israel’s State assets be frozen and used for the reconstruction of Gaza?
Very significant - Lemkin Institute on Genocide Prevention speaks out.
Domicide in Gaza documented again and again. Any more delay by other States or the Security Council of the UN or the ICC,  to prevent damage, makes them complicit in these crimes.
Another major symbolic win for Palestinian rights?
Important Statement by IASC Principals on the UNRWA: We cannot abandon the people of Gaza.
Better late than never for the UK especially given its historic colonial responsibility for the violations of Palestinian rights.
Oped by me in today’s NY Times on domicide in Gaza
Interview on Al Jazeera Arabic about UNRWA and the buffer zone along Gaza border.

On this International Holocaust Remembrance Day, we must remember and honor the Jewish, Roma, LGBTQ, disabled and many million victims of Nazi and others’ atrocities in WWII. Holocaust, as a grave example of genocide, was a step by step process.

#ICJ has ruled. Almost exactly as I predicted a while ago. No cease fire and many other provisional measures granted. I applaud the court but ask: how many deaths will now continue until the risk of genocide becomes actual one?

NY Times interviewed me on the latest in Gaza:

https://nytimes.com/live/2024/01/23/world/israel-hamas-gaza-news/israel-says-a-buffer-zone-would-protect-its-people-critics-say-the-policy-could-be-a-war-crime?smid=url-share…

https://nytimes.com/2024/01/23/world/middleeast/israel-gaza-buffer-zone.html…
When everything Israel has done is unprecedented, what new horizons of suffering will be see in the future? That depends squarely on whether there will be accountability for these crimes.
When western media is this biased against Palestinian deaths and suffering, they not only fail the test of professionalism; they fail the test of human decency.

Important detail in this European Parliament resolution that makes it a difficult one to go forward: it is conditional on Hamas being dismantled and hostages being released. Agree in substance about hostages but cease fire should come first even for hostages’ safety.
Tent cities housing more than a million displaced Gazans near Rafah are gross violations of human rights and humanitarian law. In wet, windy winter weather. Cease fire and urgent assistance now!

In Gaza, a new international crime - educaricide  or the killing of learning - needs to be added to be list of crimes under international law when schools and universities are systematically destroyed, resulting in generational damage to societies.
The world needs to uphold international law and justice - not a ‘rules based order’. We, UN human rights experts, welcome start of ICJ genocide hearings in the Hague and reiterate call for ceasefire.
The world needs to uphold international law and justice - not a ‘rules based order’. We, UN human rights experts, welcome start of ICJ genocide hearings in the Hague and reiterate call for ceasefire.
South Africa’s case at the #ICJ is harbinger of a new world order led by the formerly oppressed and enslaved. A real TWAIL (Third World Approaches to International Law) moment of hope.

Actions speak order than words. Cease fire and withdraw your army now. Negotiate for hostage release. Allow humanitarian supplies immediately. End occupation. Agree to undertake these before the ICJ tomorrow.

About 56% of houses in Gaza are destroyed or damaged. Northern Gaza is most heavily affected with upto 82% destroyed or damaged. ICJ should consider this as evidence of genocide when coupled with public statements documented before it by South Africa.

Settlements on Palestinian land are illegal. Territory can never be annexed using force and occupation. The real focus now needs to turn to ending occupation and preventing annexation. https://x.com/muhammadshehad/muhammadshehad2/status/1744032502014984664…
Very good interview with Ambassador Chas Freeman. Israel and US should listen for their own good.

For any ‘day after’ plan for Gaza to work, Israel must end its occupation, withdraw all forces and restore full sovereignty to the Palestinian people. Root cause of all hostility and hatred is the occupation.
Domicide committed by Israel in Gaza. Now being discussed in Israeli media. #ICC and #ICJ take note.

Forcible transfer of Gazan population is an act of genocide especially given the high number of children. Congolese or other States officials will be guilty of aiding and abetting genocide if they agree to any transfer of population.
You can add domicide (the deliberate destruction of home) to the crimes of genocide and ethnic cleansing.

What can the #ICJ order #Israel to do? #SouthAfrica has asked the court to 1) order a ceasefire (para 144 of its petition https://icj-cij.org/sites/default/files/case-related/192/192-20231228-app-01-00-en.pdf…).

It will be important to order the safe entry of fact finders/monitors into Gaza for which Israel must enable safe access. Finally, the periodic reports by Israel to the court must be made public although this is usually perhaps not the case.
"The Scream of Gaza" by Tunisian artist Omar Esstar.
Domicide by Russia even as it sheds crocodile tears about the destruction of Gaza. The unbelievable hypocrisy of so many States.
When domicide = genocide

What has happened in Gaza is the result of what I call ‘institutionalized impunity’. Impunity for occupation. For a war of extermination. Genocide, war crimes and crimes against humanity. If the ICC does not act very soon, we need a special tribunal for Gaza and action by States.
‘Domicide’ in Gaza: one more pitch. Anyone listening?
Israel mistakenly killed three hostages, IDF says. Isn’t this more evidence that the use of force in Gaza is indiscriminate? Such tragedy which the families of those hostages do not surely deserve.

Even CNN reports this: Nearly half of the Israeli munitions dropped on Gaza are imprecise ‘dumb bombs,’ US intelligence assessment finds. What’s the US Govt response?  https://cnn.com/2023/12/13/politics/intelligence-assessment-dumb-bombs-israel-gaza/index.html…

‘Palestinian girls are seeing their future – already fragile after 56 years of #Israeli occupation – destroyed in front of their eyes’ say UN experts, calling for a #CeasefireNOW and investigations into allegations of sexual violence on October 7 #Gaza
https://ow.ly/lG9950QiFsb

A beautiful rumination by the Palestinian minister of culture on the real meaning of losing a home. It is a repository of memories, not just a building. As Milan Kundera said, the struggle of man against power is the struggle of memory against forgetting.

❝Destruction of housing (in Gaza) has been on a scale that we have not witnessed in any recent conflict including in Syria and Ukraine❞

UN rapporteur urges Israel's accountability for Gaza destruction in an Anadolu interview http://v.aa.com.tr/3079676
Starvation is a war crime. What a way to celebrate the 85th anniversary of the UDHR and the Genocide Convention.
Complicity of the US leaders and commanders with war crimes in Gaza continues. ICC Prosecutor Karim Khan should act.
Widespread destruction in Gaza puts concept of ‘domicide’ in focus.

More thoughts on the #Israel #OPT conflict:

Hostage taking of Israelis - whether of civilians or military personnel - and attacks on Israeli civilians by Hamas are grave breaches of international law.
Israel continues to commit grave crimes through its colonial occupation, land theft, home demolitions and rule by apartheid. But resistance to such crimes does not condone other crimes by Hamas.

The International Criminal Court should investigate all alleged crimes by both sides - starting with Israeli apartheid - expeditiously and hold everyone who is guilty, accountable.  It needs to move faster.

Gravely concerned at the ongoing violence in #Israel and #OPT.  Attacking civilians and apartment buildings on either side is a grave violation of international law.  Occupation and rule by apartheid, the root of this violence, must end now.
One more step towards an apartheid regime and society.  Spatial segregation of this kind is blatantly illegal.  What’s the response from the rest of Israel and of international community?

https://haaretz.com/israel-news/2023-04-03/ty-article/.premium/israels-top-court-rules-against-evicting-palestinian-family-in-jlem-after-32-year-battle/00000187-46a5-d027-a7af-c7f78d880000?mibextid=Zxz2cZ…

A rare glimpse of Justice for a Palestinian family.  Regrettably, the Court did not invalidate the Absentee Property Law, a source of human rights violations for over 30 years.
